description: These savoury Chinese scallion pancakes are perfect with your favourite dipping sauce like sweet chilli or hoi sin.
name: Chinese Scallion Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat with the remaining dough and spring onions. Heat a large non-stick pan with oil and cook the pancakes for 2-3 minutes on each side until lightly golden and crisp.
